title: Cliche Football Typeface
content:
Hello! I'm looking for this font used for Crimson Tide, College Football Gameday, etc. It's such a cliche font but my client would like to use this typeface in a project. Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830214914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-10-04%20at%201_5468.17.48%20PM.png)

Font: 

 Square Slabserif 711 Bold 

Solved By: 

 [John Lyttle](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830214914/http:/typophile.com/user/45649 "View user profile.")
author: feldhouse

comments.content:
That looks like [Square Slabserif 711 Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830214914/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/square-slabserif-711/) by Georg Trump

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/square-slabserif-711/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830214914/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/square-slabserif-711/)
